roleset.name: hit heavily
roleset.note: SLUG-V NOTES: Member of VNcls swat-18.2. (from slug.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: If he pokes his nose in here I'll slug him.

example.name: with instrument/weapon
example.text: ``[*] Running around in the moonlight almost naked and slugging a man with a rock''?

example.name: this is a weird usage
example.text: Then he calmly and carefully slugged the remaining five shots into the venomous head -- caught in the wicker back of the chair, the eyes dead on him as the life finally went out of the brute.
example.arg: into the venomous head -- caught in the wicker back of the chair, the eyes dead on him as the life finally went out of the brute

roleset.name: swallow in a single shot
roleset.note: SLUG-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on ULA. Member of VNcls gobble-39.3-2. (from slug.04-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: He was applying for a new job in a different department, found he was going to be working with a woman, slugged a shot of booze and immediately made an ass of himself.

example.name: slug down
example.text: A guy with a bottle-shaped brown paper bag , damp and wrinkled at its upper end , has almost certainly been slugging down a sweet wine of high proof , and the odds are pretty good you would find it is a muscadoodle .
example.arg: A guy with a bottle-shaped brown paper bag, damp and wrinkled at its upper end
a sweet wine of high proof

roleset.name: (cause to) bear through blows
roleset.note: SLUG_OUT-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena (from slug.03-v)

example.text: The ruling and opposition parties slugging it out over the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant.
example.arg: over the Fourth Nuclear Power Plant
